courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHEM 103 and TAM 251.
description: Integrative approach to mechanobiology; mechanics of cell adhesion; cytoskeletal structure and mechanics; mechanotransduction; mechanics of cell proliferation, apoptosis, cancer cells, and stem cells; aging; critical issues facing the mechanobiological sciences. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHEM 103 and TAM 251.
label: Mechanobiology
